name: DUSK (itch) (projetephemere)
description:
DUSK is two players game between the kid, Jimmy, and the Boogeyman. Jimmy has to get back home as soon as possible before the Boogeyman eats him alive! Therefore, at 7 o'clock, the Boogeyman has the power to locate the child quick so he can eat him.   

Controls for the kid and the Boogeyman:

W: Forward  A: Left S: Backward D: Right

Mouse to Rotate.

Developpers:

Maxime Boisvert - Artist Jimmy Cao - Programmer / Designer/ Sound Designer Kyan Daigneault - Artist Caroline Palardy - Programmer Karim Zniber -  Programmer / Artist

Credits: 

Ambiances musics by Kevin MacLeod
